The volume slider also does not change the volume, but I heard that it just needs some cleaning out in the inside from some people that know more about it than me.  I don‚Äôt have the tools I need to open it up, so I‚Äôm hoping to just trade for the AGS 101.  
The Silver cartridge is working, and has a brand new battery.  Also has a custom display box that comes with it.

I don't really care too much about condition of the AGS 101, but it's fine as long as it all works

Might also be willing to throw in some cash or pokemon cards if you collect those depending on condition of the AGS 101
